page.title: 11EDUCATION AROUND OSSINGTON.
page.content: The majority of children in and around the Ossington area attend {Norwell Church of England school, about three miles away, from the age rising five to eleven. This school in 1985 has approximately{forty}children on the register. After leaving the junior school children usually continue their secondary education at{Tuxford {Comprehensive,}as Ossington lies within the catchment area of this school. It is a modern school with approximately{800}pupils situated about six miles away in a northerly direction. However should parents wish to do so they are at liberty to have their children educated at other state schools providing places are available, or privately, at their own expense, at a school of their choice.
